name: Doctor for toys
description:
Every kid has his favorite toys, with which he simply loves to play and spend all his time. But over time they wear out and break. Imagine that you are a real doctor, and not simple, but one that treats toys. Introducing your kids a new game from a series of educational games for children: "Doctor for toys."
If you strongly love your toys and see that they need your help. If you are always ready to take care of them, but do not know how to treat a doll, a robot or your favorite plush toys - then our new game is just for you, because it will help kids learn how to bring their toys in order in a fun game form. After a little work and trying, your child learns how to really take care of their toys, take care of them, teach them to treat them carefully.
Our game in the hospital for toys is informative and fascinating. In it, each toy has its own injuries, which the kid will need to fix, conducting serious treatment. They are all soiled, they lack some parts and they urgently need your help. Do operations, sew up wounds, replace the missing parts or replace them with new ones. Do everything you can! After all, the goal of the game is simple - you need to do everything possible to mend toys.
Become a real expert in the repair of toys. Learn to play, use your time with advantage. Play our new game, get a lot of positive emotions, and funny characters, nice music and a fascinating plot of the game will help you with this.
If your baby likes games about the hospital - our game is what he needs. Download and install the application on your phone or tablet and start playing doctor for toys right now!



Visit us at: Site: http://y-groupgames.com
